title: BERLIN MUSIC VIDEO AWARDS 2019 NOMINEES
text:
BERLIN MUSIC VIDEO AWARDS 2019 NOMINEES
Here is the complete list of the Berlin Music Video Awards 2019 nominees!
Coming to Network? Check out who else is gonna be there!
List of attending 2019 nominees: HERE
